trans-unit.source: Defines a single item of the project as it is passed into a task.
trans-unit.target: 定義專案的單一項目，因為它會傳遞至工作。

trans-unit.source: TaskItem objects do not exactly correspond to item elements in project files.
trans-unit.target: TaskItem 物件將會有不完全對應到專案檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: If they did, then tasks would have access to data that was not explicitly passed into the task through the project file.
trans-unit.target: 如果有，工作會讓未明確地傳遞到工作透過專案檔的資料存取。

trans-unit.source: This is not a security issue, but rather an issue with project file clarity and transparency.
trans-unit.target: 這不是安全性問題，但而不是使用專案檔清晰度和透明度問題。

trans-unit.source: This class has to be sealed since the build engine instantiates its own copy of this type.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會有的建置引擎會具現化本身的此類型後，必須密封。

trans-unit.source: If a third party were to extend this class, then the build engine will yield an undesired behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果第三方是要延伸此類別，則建置引擎會產生意外的行為。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables this type to be COM-creatable.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓 COM 建立此型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref> class using the specified source <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref>類別使用指定的來源<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The item to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref> class using the specified item-specification string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref>類別使用指定的項目規格字串。

trans-unit.source: The item specification.
trans-unit.target: 項目規格。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref> class using the specified item-specification string and its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem"></xref>類別使用指定的項目規格字串和它的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The item specification.
trans-unit.target: 項目規格。

trans-unit.source: The custom metadata for the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 項目規格的自訂中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Clones the collection of custom metadata for the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 複製集合的項目規格的自訂中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: This method does not include built-in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不包含內建中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents a clone of the custom metadata.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>代表自訂中繼資料的複本。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Copies the item-specification metadata to the specified destination task item.
trans-unit.target: 將項目規格中繼資料複製到指定的目的地工作項目。

trans-unit.source: If the metadata already exists on the destination item, then it is not overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果中繼資料已存在於目的地項目，則它是不覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The original metadata value supersedes the copied metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 原始中繼資料值會取代已複製的中繼資料值。

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy the item specification to the destination task item.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會複製到目的工作項目項目規格。

trans-unit.source: The item that this method will copy metadata to.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會複製中繼資料的項目。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的項目上指定的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The name of the metadata to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的中繼資料名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the metadata value.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示中繼資料值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gives task items infinite lease time.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，可讓工作項目具有無限期租用時間。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a limited lease of 5 minutes will result; and task instances can expire if they take a long time to process.
trans-unit.target: 否則將會造成有限的租用為 5 分鐘。而且，若它們需要很長的時間來處理，工作執行個體就會過期。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to specify an infinite lifetime.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>若要指定無限存留期。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目規格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem.ItemSpec%2A> for the following item declaration in a project file is `File.cs`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem.ItemSpec%2A>檔案是在專案中的下列項目宣告`File.cs`。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem.ItemSpec%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the item specification.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示項目規格。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of metadata set on the item.
trans-unit.target: 取得設定的項目上的中繼資料數目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the count of metadata set on the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>代表的項目上設定的中繼資料的計數。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of all the metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目上的所有中繼資料的名稱。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of metadata names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的中繼資料名稱。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref> implementation which returns a clone of the metadata on this object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref>實作會傳回此物件上的中繼資料的複本。

trans-unit.source: Values returned are in their original escaped form.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是在其原始的逸出格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cloned metadata, with values' escaping preserved.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值的逸出保留的複製的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref> implementation which gets or sets the item include value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref>取得或設定項目實作包含值。

trans-unit.source: For disk-based items this would be the file path.
trans-unit.target: 這會是以磁碟為基礎的項目是檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item include value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的項目包含值。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref> implementation which allows the values of metadata on the item to be queried.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref>實作可讓查詢項目上的中繼資料值。

trans-unit.source: The metadata to be queried
trans-unit.target: 要查詢的中繼資料

trans-unit.source: Returns the escaped metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回逸出的中繼資料值。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref> implementation which allows a piece of custom metadata to be set on the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2"></xref>允許的項目上設定的自訂中繼資料的實作。

trans-unit.source: Assumes that the value passed in is unescaped, and escapes the value as necessary in order to maintain its value.
trans-unit.target: 假設傳入的值為未逸出，並依需要逸出此值，以便維護其值。

trans-unit.source: The metadata name.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料名稱。

trans-unit.source: The metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料值。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 移除的項目上指定的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The name of metadata to remove.
trans-unit.target: 若要移除的中繼資料的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Sets or modifies the value of the specified metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 設定或修改項目上指定的中繼資料的值。

trans-unit.source: The name of metadata to set or modify.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定或修改的中繼資料的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The new value of metadata.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料的新值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目規格。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the item specification.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示項目規格。</xref:System.String>
